WRITING.TITLE: How to get your pioneer crates for cheaper.
WRITING.TEXT:
If you didn't already know, changing your characters appearance for 3k will reset your crate prices back to the original 700 price. My suggestion would be to get up to the 4200 price and pay 3k to reset your character and rinse and repeat the process. Also if you're asking, Yes you do keep your clothes that you earned.
Bonus tip: you can right click and sell your items that have been earned

ok then there is your answer, TC stops people that are unauthorized from building in and around it. What my guess is that someone built up to your window, broke it down with tools. took your loot and jumped out and replaced the window and destroyed whatever build up they had.
The reason for doing this is they hope you think its just a glitch that you lost all of your stuff and don't address your base flaw. Basically double dipping into your loot with the same base design.
My suggestion Build a TC, always.

Do you have an accessible TC? if so they might have accessed the TC and rebuilt your base after breaking through. If not there could have been a way to jump into your base through a window. I would suggest not putting up windows unless you can afford metal window bars and they're on the 3rd floor or higher.

WRITING.TITLE: (Suggestion) Master Code for code lock
WRITING.TEXT:
- Code locks currently only take one code - Have a master code that you can place in by holding the 'use' key - Master code can only be placed by the person placing the lock - Master code can only be applied when the lock is first placed - Cannot remove lock without putting in the master code - Does not matter what regular code is changed to. Master code will still unlock the door - 5 digits so less chance of guessing master code.
I believe if they implement the master code this will be a good QOL change. Even if someone guesses your regular code you can still use the master code to get into the doors. This could avoid people getting code raided. Also an extra level of security for players.
Thoughts?

WRITING.TITLE: People would kill the same amount of nakeds (maybe more) if guns showed up on backs.
WRITING.TEXT:
IMO, i don't think having a gun show up on a nakeds back will make me kill them less. People are going to kill for killings sake. Its what makes up a huge part of the game.
The 2 routes this could go is: 1. See a gun on a nakeds back and deal with the threat. 2. Not see a gun on the nakeds back and kill him for whatever loot he could have possibly picked up.
My proposed solution is Xray Goggles with 6x zoom and night vision. possible heat signature detecting software can be added for 1 tech trash and 6 metal frags. EZ solution.

WRITING.TITLE: (Suggestion) Being able to ALT look around while downed. Also being able to pick yourself back up with the right medical tools.
WRITING.TEXT:
So here is my expansion on the idea.
1. So the timer for being down should be 20 seconds. 2. You should be able to alt while down. 3. If you have the right medical tool, maybe something different than the syringe to be able to dress your wound. Maybe Adrenaline shot? made with water and a new medicine component plus the usual syringe ingredients.
Now here are the stipulations/balancing things.
1. No more RNG getting up 2. ALTing is a lower sensitivity and more restricted while on the ground (maybe fuzzy vision/blurry) 3. the self dressing/healing takes 15 seconds to complete. 4. Using the syringe (new medical tool) does not restart your 20 second timer while down, so there is a potential that you don't get it off in time if you're ALT looking for too long while you're down.
Let me know what you guys think or if you have any improvements on this suggestion.
My thinking is this will vary combat a little bit more with PVP, It will also make it so there is a lot more actual killing happening so you can see who killed you instead of them just letting you writhe on the ground and die.

The only comment to this should be
"thanks team for adding this feature that we've asked for!"
The complainers and the "ZOMG finally I've been waiting 8 years for this about damn time" need to calm down

since you're trying to be discrete, here is my advice. Now i don't know the limitations of your projects or if you're only allowed to use one shared document. I would send it to your superiors saying something along the lines of here is my portion, the others will be sending theirs in separately. If they haven't touched the shared document and expect you to do the work this is a decent way of showing that 1. you are taking owner ship for your work and 2. you can feign ignorance and say that since they did not touch the shared document you assumed they were using their own document to turn in.

WRITING.TITLE: Crying your way to the lighthouse.
WRITING.TEXT: So here's the trend i've been seeing since this years ToO launched. Guardians begging and pleading for a win. Messages such as... nbsp; "we've never been to the lighthouse before, can you let us win so we can get there?" "just looking for a quick run through, could you guys jump off and let us through to the next match" "we're on our 8th win! never gone flawless before! could you please give it to us?" nbsp; is this what its coming down to? I've replied to them with a courteous "sorry but we're also trying to get to the lighthouse" and get messages back like fuck you etc is anyone else getting these messages? are you ok with it? nbsp; I know the difference of teams that have gone flawless letting people through when one of the other team's players disconnects but that decision is based on that team. Asking guardians to step aside in the Trials of Osiris is not how its supposed to be.
